elements.name: Refund option shown for a logged in single kiosk ticket

steps.name: I am logged into the system
I go to the search results for the following journey:
accept the alert message
proceed search results to the payment screen
I should see the "Payment" screen
I click on the "Self-service ticket machine" button
I select Pay by card method
add the card with the following criteria:
I should see the "Payment" screen
I type "111" text into "CVV" field
click on the "Buy" button
I proceed to booking confirmation
I should see the "Booking Confirmation" screen
I should see the "My Tickets" screen
I scroll to the "Manage my booking" text
I should see the "Refund tickets" text is shown
I click on the "Refund tickets" text
I should see the "Refund overview" screen
the following labels are shown:
the "Collected your ticket already toggle" field is not checked
the "Request refund" button is visible
the "We send refunds directly to the card used for bookings. It arrives within 5 working days" text is shown

arguments.val: We send refunds directly to the card used for bookings. It arrives within 5 working days

elements.name: Refund are not available for bookings worth less than £10

steps.name: I am logged into the system
I go to the search results for the following journey:
accept the alert message
proceed search results to the payment screen
I should see the "Payment" screen
I click on the "Self-service ticket machine" button
I select Pay by card method
add the card with the following criteria:
I should see the "Payment" screen
I type "111" text into "CVV" field
click on the "Buy" button
I proceed to booking confirmation
I should see the "Booking Confirmation" screen
I should see the "My Tickets" screen
I scroll to the "Manage my booking" text
I should see the "Refund tickets" text is shown
I click on the "Refund tickets" text
I should see the "Refund overview" screen
none of the following labels are shown:
I should see the "Request refund" button is hidden
the following labels are shown:

cells: the refundable amount is too low.

elements.name: Refund option shown for a single guest kiosk ticket

steps.name: I am not logged into the system
I go to the search results for the following journey:
accept the alert message
proceed search results to the payment screen
I should see the "Payment" screen
I click on the "Self-service ticket machine" button
I select Pay by PayPal method
I should see the "Paypal Login" screen
I login into PayPal
I proceed to booking confirmation
I should see the "Booking Confirmation" screen
I should see the "My Tickets" screen
I scroll to the "Manage my booking" text
I should see the "Refund tickets" text is shown

elements.name: Refund option shown for a single business kiosk ticket

steps.name: I am logged into the system under business account
business account has no payment cards stored
I go to the search results for the following journey:
accept the alert message
I should see the "Out Search Results" screen
I proceed search results to the payment screen
I should see the "Payment" screen
I add details for 1 passenger
I click on the "Self-service ticket machine" button
I select Pay by PayPal method
I should see the "Paypal Login" screen
I login into PayPal
proceed to booking confirmation
I should see the "Booking Confirmation" screen
I should see the "My Tickets" screen
I scroll to the "Manage my booking" text
I should see the "Refund tickets" text is shown

elements.name: Refund option NOT shown for a single guest mobile ticket

steps.name: I am not logged into the system
I go to the search results for the following journey:
accept the alert message
proceed search results to the payment screen
I should see the "Payment" screen
I click on the "Mobile ticket" element
I clear text from "Traveller Name" field
I type "Refunds Rock" text into "Traveller Name" field
I select Pay by PayPal method
I should see the "Paypal Login" screen
I login into PayPal
I proceed to booking confirmation
I should see the "Booking Confirmation" screen
I should see the "My Tickets" screen
I scroll to the "Manage my booking" text
I should see the "Refund tickets" text is not shown

name: Refunds
description:
As a user
I want to be able to refund my tickets
So that I can get money back when I dont travel
